a.n: Mavericks/Warriors, 2007 NBA Western Conference First Round - Game 6 - Pop Up Edition

p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Baron Davis willed his team on one good leg, shaking off a strained hamstring to score 20 points, Steven Jackson made a franchise playoff-record seven 3-pointers, and Golden State became the first No. 8 seed to capture a best-of-seven playoff series with a 111-86 victory over the NBA-best Dallas Mavericks in Game 6.
